name: homo-lumen-agent-coordination
description: HOMO LUMEN - Agent Coordination with Gemma 3 Integration

scripts.test: npm run test:local && npm run test:mcp && npm run test:ai-studio && npm run test:gemma3 && npm run test:extended-coalition && npm run test:dual-layer
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.start: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
